articles.author: Eilish O'Regan
articles.title: Warning of more cases of mystery hepatitis in children expected throughout Europe - Independent.ie
articles.description: More cases of mystery severe hepatitis in children, which has already struck a small number of young people in Ireland, are expected throughout Europe, a disease watchdog warned yesterday.
articles.content:

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: What happens if Russia turns off its gas to Europe? Here's who's most vulnerable - ABC News
articles.description: Russia halts gas supplies to Poland and Bulgaria because they didn't pay for their gas in Russian currency. Now other European countries are worried they'll also get cut off if they don't pay in roubles.
articles.content: Moscow has stopped sending gas to Poland and Bulgaria for refusing to pay for their imported energy in roubles, which has some Russian-gas-reliant EU countries fearing they could loose their supplies… [+5218 chars]
